title: What can I do if the Y536A1 phone screen does not rotate automatically?
answer:
l   Turn on the auto-rotate screen function.

Open the notification panel and touch ![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=SupportImage&imagePath=/20141023045806700001.png) to turn on the auto-rotate screen function. 

l   If this happens when you are using a third-party application, check whether the application is tilt sensor-based. 

                                    l   Your phone's tilt sensor may fail to work if certain system files are deleted. Back up 

                                        important data and restore your phone to its factory settings or update your phone.
